yellowston (disambiguation). yellowston nation park iucn categori ii (nation park) grand canyon yellowston locat yellowston nation park locat park county, wyom teton county, wyom gallatin county, montana park county, montana fremont county, idaho coordin 44°36′n 110°30′w﻿ / ﻿44.600°n 110.500°w﻿ / 44.600; -110.500coordinates: 44°36′n 110°30′w﻿ / ﻿44.600°n 110.500°w﻿ / 44.600; -110.500 area 2,219,791 acr (3,468.423&#160;sq&#160;mi; 898,318&#160;ha; 8,983.18&#160;km2)[1] establish march&#160;1,&#160;1872&#160;(1872-march-01) visitor 3,394,326 (in&#160;2012)[2] governing&#160;bodi u.s. nation park servic unesco world heritag site type natur criteria vii, viii, ix, x design 1978 (2nd session) reference&#160;no. 28[3] region america endang 1995–2003 aerial view, 3d comput gener imag yellowston nation park (arapaho: henihco'oo héetíhco'oo)[4] nation park locat primarili u.s. state wyoming, although also extend montana idaho. establish u.s.&#160;congress sign law presid ulyss s. grant march 1, 1872.[5][6] yellowstone, first nation park u.s. wide held first nation park world,[7] known wildlif mani geotherm features, especi old faith geyser, one popular featur park.[8] mani type ecosystems, subalpin forest abundant. part south central rocki forest ecoregion. nativ american live yellowston region least 11,000&#160;years.[9] asid visit mountain men early-to-mid-19th century, organ explor begin late 1860s. manag park origin fell jurisdict secretari interior. however, u.s. armi subsequ commiss overse manag yellowston 30-year period 1886 1916.[10] 1917, administr park transfer nation park service, creat previou year. hundr structur built protect architectur histor significance, research examin 1,000 archaeolog sites. yellowston nation park span area 3,468.4 squar mile (8,983&#160;km2),[1] compris lakes, canyons, river mountain ranges.[8] yellowston lake one largest high-elev lake north america center yellowston caldera, largest supervolcano continent. caldera consid activ volcano. erupt tremend forc sever time last two million years.[11] half world' geotherm featur yellowstone, fuel ongo volcanism.[12] lava flow rock volcan erupt cover land area yellowstone. park centerpiec greater yellowston ecosystem, largest remain nearly-intact ecosystem earth' northern temper zone.[13] hundr speci mammals, birds, fish reptil documented, includ sever either endang threatened.[8] vast forest grassland also includ uniqu speci plants. yellowston park largest famou megafauna locat continent unit states. grizzli bears, wolves, free-rang herd bison elk live park. yellowston park bison herd oldest largest public bison herd unit states. forest fire occur park year; larg forest fire 1988, nearli one third park burnt. yellowston numer recreat opportunities, includ hiking, camping, boating, fish sightseeing. pave road provid close access major geotherm area well lake waterfalls. winter, visitor often access park way guid tour use either snow coach snowmobiles. content 1 histori 1.1 park creation 1.2 later histori 1.3 heritag research center 2 geographi 3 geolog 3.1 histori 3.2 geyser hydrotherm system 3.3 earthquak 4 biolog ecolog 4.1 flora 4.2 fauna 5 forest fire 6 climat 7 recreat 8 legal jurisdict 9 see also 10 refer 11 read 12 extern link history[edit] detail pictori map 1904 park headwat yellowston river, take histor name. near end 18th century, french trapper name river "roch jaune", probabl translat hidatsa name "mi tsi a-da-zi" (rock yellow river).[14] later, american trapper render french name english "yellow stone". although commonli believ river name yellow rock seen grand canyon yellowstone, nativ american name sourc unclear.[15] human histori park begin least 11,000 year ago nativ american began hunt fish region. construct post offic gardiner, montana, 1950s, obsidian projectil point clovi origin found date approxim 11,000 year ago.[16] paleo-indians, clovi culture, use signific amount obsidian found park make cut tool weapons. arrowhead made yellowston obsidian found far away mississippi valley, indic regular obsidian trade exist local tribe tribe farther east.[17] time white explor first enter region lewi clark expedit 1805, encount nez perce, crow, shoshon tribes. pass present day montana, expedit member heard yellowston region south, investig it.[17] 1806, john colter, member lewi clark expedition, left join group fur trappers. split trapper 1807, colter pass portion later becam park, winter 1807–1808. observ least one geotherm area northeastern section park, near tower fall.[18] surviv wound suffer battl member crow blackfoot tribe 1809, colter describ place "fire brimstone" peopl dismiss delirium; supposedli imaginari place nicknam "colter' hell". next 40 years, numer report mountain men trapper told boil mud, steam rivers, petrifi trees, yet report believ time myth.[19] 1856 exploration, mountain man jim bridger (also believ first second european american seen great salt lake) report observ boil springs, spout water, mountain glass yellow rock. report larg ignor bridger known "spinner yarns". 1859, u.s. armi surveyor name captain william f. raynold embark two-year survey northern rockies. winter wyoming, may 1860, raynold parti – includ naturalist ferdinand vandev hayden guid jim bridger – attempt cross continent divid two ocean plateau wind river drainag northwest wyoming. heavi spring snow prevent passage, abl travers divide, parti would first organ survey enter yellowston region.[20] american civil war hamper organ explor late 1860s.[21] ferdinand v. hayden (1829 – 1887) american geologist convinc congress make yellowston nation park 1872. first detail expedit yellowston area cook–folsom–peterson expedit 1869, consist three privat fund explorers. folsom parti follow yellowston river yellowston lake.[22] member folsom parti kept journal base inform reported, parti montana resid organ washburn-langford-doan expedit 1870. head surveyor-gener montana henri washburn, includ nathaniel p. langford (who later becam known "nation park" langford) u.s. armi detach command lt.&#160;gustavu doane. expedit spent month explor region, collect specimen name site interest. montana writer lawyer name corneliu hedges, member washburn expedition, propos region set asid protect nation park; wrote detail articl observ helena herald newspap 1870 1871. hedg essenti restat comment made octob 1865 act montana territori governor thoma franci meagher, previous comment region protected.[23] other made similar suggestions. 1871 letter jay cook ferdinand v. hayden, cook wrote friend, congressman william d. kelley also suggest "congress pass bill reserv great geyser basin public park forever".[24] park creation[edit] see also: expedit protect yellowston (1869–1890) ferdinand v. hayden' map yellowston nation park, 1871 1871, eleven year fail first effort, ferdinand v. hayden final abl explor region. govern sponsorship, return region second, larger expedition, hayden geolog survey 1871. compil comprehens report, includ large-format photograph william henri jackson paint thoma moran. report help convinc u.s. congress withdraw region public auction. march 1, 1872, presid ulyss s. grant sign act dedication[6] law creat yellowston nation park.[25] hayden, person thought creat park region, first enthusiast advocate.[26] believ "set asid area pleasur ground benefit enjoy people" warn would come "make merchandis beauti specimens".[26] worri area could face fate niagara falls, conclud site "be free air water."[26] report committe public lands, conclud bill fail becom law, "the vandal wait enter wonder-land, singl season despoil, beyond recovery, remark curiosities, requit cun skill natur thousand year prepare".[27][28] hayden 1871 parti recogn yellowston priceless treasur would becom rarer time. wish other see experi well. eventu railroad and, time that, automobil would make possible. park set asid strictli ecolog purposes; however, design "pleasur ground" invit creat amus park. hayden imagin someth akin scenic resort bath england, germany, switzerland.[26] act dedication[28] act set apart certain tract land lie near headwat yellowston river public park. enact senat hous repres unit state america congress assembled, tract land territori montana wyoming&#160;... herebi reserv withdrawn settlement, occupancy, sale law unit states, dedic set apart public park pleasur ground benefit enjoy people; person shall locate, settl upon, occupi part thereof, except hereinaft provided, shall consid trespass remov from&#160;... approv march 1, 1872. sign by: jame g. blaine, speaker house. schuyler colfax, vice-presid unit state presid senate. ulyss s. grant, presid unit states. (1870) portrait nathaniel p. langford, first superintend park[29] consider local opposit yellowston nation park earli years. local fear region economi would unabl thrive remain strict feder prohibit resourc develop settlement within park boundari local entrepreneur advoc reduc size park mining, hunting, log activ could developed.[30] end, numer bill introduc congress montana repres sought remov feder land-us restrictions.[31] park' offici formation, nathaniel langford appoint park' first superintend 1872. serv five year deni salary, funding, staff. langford lack mean improv land properli protect park, without formal polici regulations, legal method enforc protection. left yellowston vulner poachers, vandals, other seek raid resources. address practic problem park administr face 1872 report secretari interior[32] correctli predict yellowston would becom major intern attract deserv continu stewardship government. 1875, colonel william ludlow, previous explor area montana command georg armstrong custer, assign organ lead expedit montana newli establish yellowston park. observ lawless exploit park resourc includ ludlow' report reconnaiss yellowston nation park. report includ letter attach expedit members, includ naturalist mineralogist georg bird grinnell. great fall yellowstone", u.s. geolog geograph survey territori (1874 - 1879) photographer: william henri jackson grinnel document poach buffalo, deer, elk, antelop hides. "it estim winter 1874–1875, less 3,000 buffalo mule deer suffer even sever elk, antelop nearli much."[33] result, langford forc step 1877.[34][35] travel yellowston wit land manag problem first hand, philetu norri volunt posit follow langford' exit. congress final saw fit implement salari position, well provid minim fund oper park. norri use fund expand access park, build numer crude road facilities.[35] 1880, harri yount appoint gamekeep control poach vandal park. yount previous spent decad explor mountain countri present-day wyoming, includ grand tetons, join f v. hayden' geolog survey 1873.[36] yount first nation park ranger,[37] yount' peak, head yellowston river, name honor.[38] however, measur still prove insuffici protect park, neither norris, three superintend followed, given suffici manpow resources. fort yellowstone, formerli u.s. armi post, serv park headquarters. northern pacif railroad built train station livingston, montana, connect northern entranc earli 1880s, help increas visit 300 1872 5,000 1883.[39] visitor earli year face poor road limit services, access park hors via stagecoach. 1908 visit increas enough attract union pacif railroad connect west yellowstone, though rail visit fell consider world war ii ceas around 1960s. much railroad line convert natur trails, among yellowston branch line trail. thoma moran paint tower creek, yellowstone, hayden geolog survey 1871. 1870 1880 nativ american tribe effect exclud nation park. half-dozen tribe made season use yellowston area, year-round resid small band eastern shoshon known "sheepeaters". left area assur treati negoti 1868, sheepeat cede land retain right hunt yellowstone. unit state never ratifi treati refus recogn claim sheepeat tribe use yellowstone.[40] nez perc band associ chief joseph, number 750 people, pass yellowston nation park thirteen day late august 1877. pursu u.s.&#160;armi enter nation park two week battl big hole. nez perc friendli tourist peopl encount park; not. nine park visitor briefli taken captive. despit joseph chief order one harmed, least two peopl kill sever wounded.[41][42] one area encount occur lower geyser basin east along branch firehol river mari mountain beyond.[41] stream still known nez perc creek.[43] group bannock enter park 1878, alarm park superintend philetu norris. aftermath sheepeat indian war 1879, norri built fort prevent nativ american enter nation park.[40][42] ongo poach destruct natur resourc continu unab u.s.&#160;armi arriv mammoth hot spring 1886 built camp sheridan. next 22&#160;year armi construct perman structures, camp sheridan renam fort yellowstone.[44] may 7, 1894, boon crockett club, act person georg g. vest, arnold hague, william hallett phillips, w. a. wadsworth, archibald rogers, theodor roosevelt, georg bird grinnel success carri park protect act, save park.[45] lacey act 1900 provid legal support offici prosecut poachers. fund manpow necessari keep dilig watch, armi develop polici regul permit public access protect park wildlif natur resources. nation park servic creat 1916, mani manag principl develop armi adopt new agency.[44] armi turn control nation park servic octob 31, 1918.[46] later history[edit] park superintend horac m. albright dinner guests, 1922 1915, 1,000 automobil per year enter park, result conflict hors horse-drawn transportation. hors travel road eventu prohibited.[47] civilian conserv corp (ccc), new deal relief agenc young men, play major role 1933 1942 develop yellowston facilities. ccc project includ reforestation, campground develop mani park' trail campgrounds, trail construction, fire hazard reduction, fire-fight work. ccc built major earli visitor centers, campground current system park roads.[48] world war&#160;ii, tourist travel fell sharply, staf cut, mani facil fell disrepair.[49] 1950s, visit increas tremend yellowston nation parks. accommod increas visitation, park offici implement mission&#160;66, effort modern expand park servic facilities. plan complet 1966, honor 50th anniversari found nation park service, mission&#160;66 construct diverg tradit log cabin style design featur modern style.[50] late 1980s, construct style yellowston revert tradit designs. enorm forest fire 1988 damag much grant village, structur rebuilt tradit style. visitor center canyon village, open 2006, incorpor tradit design well.[51] roosevelt arch locat montana north entranc 1959 hebgen lake earthquak west yellowston hebgen lake damag road structur park. northwest section park, new geyser found, mani exist hot spring becam turbid.[52] power earthquak hit region record history. 1963, sever year public controversi regard forc reduct elk popul yellowstone, unit state secretari interior stewart udal appoint advisori board collect scientif data inform futur wildlif manag nation parks. paper known leopold report, committe observ cull program nation park ineffective, recommend manag yellowstone' elk population.[53] wildfir summer 1988 largest histori park. approxim 793,880 acr (321,272&#160;ha; 1,240&#160;sq&#160;mi) 36% parkland impact fires, lead systemat re-evalu fire manag policies. fire season 1988 consid normal combin drought heat mid-juli contribut extrem fire danger. "black saturday", august 20, 1988, strong wind expand fire rapidly, 150,000 acr (61,000&#160;ha; 230&#160;sq&#160;mi) burned.[54] expans cultur histori park document 1,000 archeolog site discovered. park 1,106 histor structur features, obsidian cliff five build design nation histor landmarks.[8] yellowston design intern biospher reserv octob 26, 1976, un world heritag site septemb 8, 1978. park place list world heritag danger 1995 2003 due effect tourism, infect wildlife, issu invas species.[55] 2010, yellowston nation park honor quarter america beauti quarter program.[56] heritag research center[edit] heritag research center locat gardiner, montana, near north entranc park.[57] center home yellowston nation park' museum collection, archives, research library, historian, archeolog lab, herbarium. yellowston nation park archiv maintain collect histor record yellowston nation park service. collect includ administr record yellowstone, well resourc manag records, record major projects, donat manuscript person papers. archiv affili nation archiv record administration.[58][59] geography[edit] see also: mountain mountain rang yellowston nation park, waterfal yellowston nation park plateau yellowston nation park grand canyon yellowstone. yellowston lake approxim 96 percent land area yellowston nation park locat within state wyoming. anoth three percent within montana, remain one percent idaho. park 63 mile (101&#160;km) north south, 54 mile (87&#160;km) west east air. yellowston 2,219,789 acr (898,317&#160;ha; 3,468.420&#160;sq&#160;mi)[1] area, larger state rhode island delaware. river lake cover five percent land area, largest water bodi yellowston lake 87,040 acr (35,220&#160;ha; 136.00&#160;sq&#160;mi). yellowston lake 400 feet (120&#160;m) deep 110 mile (180&#160;km) shoreline. elev 7,733 feet (2,357&#160;m) sea level, yellowston lake largest high altitud lake north america. forest compris 80 percent land area park; rest grassland.[8] continent divid north america run diagon southwestern part park. divid topograph featur separ pacif ocean atlant ocean water drainages. one third park lie west side divide. origin yellowston snake river near opposit side divide. result, water snake river flow pacif ocean, yellowston find way atlant ocean via gulf mexico. park sit yellowston plateau, averag elev 8,000 feet (2,400&#160;m) sea level. plateau bound nearli side mountain rang middl rocki mountains, rang 9,000 11,000 feet (2,700 3,400&#160;m) elevation. highest point park atop eagl peak (11,358 feet 3,462 metres) lowest along rees creek (5,282 feet 1,610 metres).[8] nearbi mountain rang includ gallatin rang northwest, beartooth mountain north, absaroka rang east, teton rang madison rang southwest west. promin summit yellowston plateau mount washburn 10,243 feet (3,122&#160;m). yellowston nation park one world' largest petrifi forests, tree long ago buri ash soil transform wood miner materials. ash volcan debri believ come park area itself. larg yellowston actual massiv caldera supervolcano. 290 waterfal least 15 feet (4.6&#160;m) park, highest lower fall yellowston river 308 feet (94&#160;m).[8] three deep canyon locat park, cut volcan tuff yellowston plateau river last 640,000&#160;years. lewi river flow lewi canyon south, yellowston river carv two color canyons, grand canyon yellowston black canyon yellowston journey north. geology[edit] main articles: geotherm area yellowstone, yellowston caldera supervolcano history[edit] columnar basalt near tower falls; larg flood basalt lava type preced mega-erupt superh ash pumic yellowston northeastern end snake river plain, great u-shap arc mountain extend boise, idaho 400 mile (640&#160;km) west. featur trace rout north american plate last 17&#160;million year transport plate tecton across stationari mantl hotspot. landscap present-day yellowston nation park recent manifest hotspot crust earth.[60] yellowston caldera largest volcan system north america. term "supervolcano" caldera form except larg explos eruptions. magma chamber lie yellowston estim singl connect chamber, 37 mile (60&#160;km) long, 18 mile (29&#160;km) wide, 3 7 mile (5 12&#160;km) deep.[61] current caldera creat cataclysm erupt occur 640,000&#160;year ago, releas 240&#160;cubic mile (1,000&#160;km³) ash, rock pyroclast materials.[62] erupt 1,000 time larger 1980 erupt mount st. helens.[63] produc caldera nearli five eighth mile (1&#160;km) deep 45 28 mile (72 45&#160;km) area deposit lava creek tuff, weld tuff geolog formation. violent known eruption, occur 2.1&#160;million year ago, eject 588&#160;cubic mile (2,450&#160;km³) volcan materi creat rock format known huckleberri ridg tuff creat island park caldera.[64] smaller erupt eject 67&#160;cubic mile (280&#160;km³) materi 1.3&#160;million year ago, form henry' fork caldera deposit mesa fall tuff.[63] three climact erupt releas vast amount ash blanket much central north america, fall mani hundr mile away. amount ash gase releas atmospher probabl caus signific impact world weather pattern led extinct species, primarili north america.[65] wooden walkway allow visitor close approach grand prismat spring. subsequ caldera-form erupt occur 160,000 year ago. form rel small caldera contain west thumb yellowston lake. sinc last supereruption, seri smaller erupt cycl 640,000 70,000&#160;year ago, nearli fill yellowston caldera &gt;80 differ erupt rhyolit lava seen obsidian cliff basalt lava view sheepeat cliff. lava strata easili seen grand canyon yellowstone, yellowston river continu carv ancient lava flows. canyon classic v-shape valley, indic river-typ eros rather eros caus glaciation.[64] erupt part erupt cycl climax partial collaps roof volcano' partial empti magma chamber. creat collaps depression, call caldera, releas vast amount volcan material, usual fissur ring caldera. time last three cataclysm erupt yellowston area rang 600,000 800,000 years, small number climact erupt cannot use make accur predict futur volcan events.[66] beehiv geyser erupt geyser hydrotherm system[edit] famou geyser park, perhap world, old faith geyser, locat upper geyser basin. castl geyser, lion geyser beehiv geyser basin. park contain largest activ geyser world—steamboat geyser norri geyser basin. studi complet 2011 found least 1283 geyser erupt yellowstone. these, averag 465 activ given year.[67][68] yellowston contain least 10,000 geotherm featur altogether. half geotherm featur two-third world' geyser concentr yellowstone.[69] may 2001, u.s. geolog survey, yellowston nation park, univers utah creat yellowston volcano observatori (yvo), partnership long-term monitor geolog process yellowston plateau volcan field, dissemin inform concern potenti hazard geolog activ region.[70] old faith geyser erupt approxim everi 91 minutes. 2003, chang norri geyser basin result temporari closur trail basin. new fumarol observed, sever geyser show enhanc activ increas water temperatures. sever geyser becam hot transform pure steam features; water becom superh could longer erupt normally.[71] coincid releas report multipl year unit state geolog survey research project map bottom yellowston lake identifi structur dome uplift time past. research indic uplift pose immedi threat volcan eruption, sinc may develop long ago, temperatur increas found near uplifts.[72] march 10, 2004, biologist discov 5 dead bison appar inhal toxic geotherm gase trap norri geyser basin season atmospher inversion. close follow upsurg earthquak activ april 2004.[73] 2006, report mallard lake dome sour creek dome— area long known show signific chang ground movement— risen rate 1.5 2.4 inch (3.8 6.1&#160;cm) per year mid–2004 2006. late 2007, uplift continu reduc rate.[74][75] event inspir great deal media attent specul geolog futur region. expert respond conjectur inform public increas risk volcan erupt near future.[76] however, chang demonstr dynam natur yellowston hydrotherm system. earthquakes[edit] main terrac mammoth hot spring yellowston experi thousand small earthquak everi year, virtual undetect people. six earthquak least magnitud 6 greater histor times, includ 7.5‑magnitud quak struck outsid northwest boundari park 1959. quak trigger huge landslide, caus partial dam collaps hebgen lake; immedi downstream, sediment landslid dam river creat new lake, known earthquak lake. twenty-eight peopl killed, properti damag extens immedi region. earthquak caus geyser northwestern section park erupt, larg crack ground form emit steam, hot spring normal clear water turn muddy.[52] 6.1‑magnitud earthquak struck insid park june 30, 1975, damag minimal. upper terrac mammoth hot spring three month 1985, 3,000 minor earthquak detect northwestern section park, refer earthquak swarm, attribut minor subsid yellowston caldera.[63] begin april 30, 2007, 16 small earthquak magnitud 2.7 occur yellowston caldera sever days. swarm earthquak common, 70 swarm 1983 2008.[77] decemb 2008, 250 earthquak measur four-day span yellowston lake, largest measur magnitud 3.9.[78] januari 2010, 250 earthquak detect two-day period.[79] seismic activ yellowston nation park continu report hourli earthquak hazard program u.s. geolog survey.[80] march 30, 2014, magnitud 4.8 earthquak struck almost middl yellowston near norri basin 6.34am; report indic damage. largest earthquak hit park sinc februari 22, 1980.[81] biolog ecology[edit] main articles: greater yellowston ecosystem ecolog rocki mountain meadow yellowston nation park yellowston nation park centerpiec 20&#160;million acre/31,250&#160;square-mil (8,093,712&#160;ha/80,937&#160;km2) greater yellowston ecosystem, region includ grand teton nation park, adjac nation forest expans wilder area forests. ecosystem largest remain continu stretch mostli undevelop pristin land continent unit states, consid world' largest intact ecosystem northern temper zone[13] (although area mostli temper subalpine, nation forest land surround nation park intact). success wolf reintroduct program, began 1990s, virtual origin faunal speci known inhabit region white explor first enter area still found there. flora[edit] 1,700 speci tree vascular plant nativ park. anoth 170 speci consid exot speci non-native. eight conif tree speci documented, lodgepol pine forest cover 80% total forest areas.[8] conifers, subalpin fir, engelmann spruce, rocki mountain douglas-fir whitebark pine, found scatter grove throughout park. 2007, whitebark pine threaten fungu known white pine blister rust; however, mostli confin forest well north west. yellowstone, seven percent whitebark pine speci impact fungus, compar nearli complet infest northwestern montana.[82] quak aspen willow common speci decidu trees. aspen forest declin significantli sinc earli 20th century, scientist oregon state univers attribut recent recoveri aspen reintroduct wolv chang graze habit local elk.[83] yellowston sand verbena endem yellowstone' lakeshores. dozen speci flower plant identified, bloom month may september.[84] yellowston sand verbena rare flower plant found yellowstone. close relat speci usual found much warmer climates, make sand verbena enigma. estim 8,000 exampl rare flower plant make home sandi soil shore yellowston lake, well waterline.[85] yellowstone' hot waters, bacteria form mat bizarr shape consist trillion individuals. bacteria primit life form earth. fli arthropod live mats, even middl bitterli cold winters. initially, scientist thought microb gain susten sulfur. 2005 research univers colorado boulder discov susten least divers hyperthermophil speci molecular hydrogen.[86] thermu aquaticu bacterium found yellowston hot spring produc import enzym (taq polymerase) easili replic lab use replic dna part polymeras chain reaction (pcr) process. retriev bacteria achiev impact ecosystem. bacteria yellowston hot spring may also prove use scientist search cure variou diseases.[87] non-n plant sometim threaten nativ speci use nutrient resources. though exot speci commonli found area greatest human visitation, near road major tourist areas, also spread backcountry. generally, exot speci control pull plant soil spraying, time consum expensive.[88] fauna[edit] main articles: anim yellowstone, bird yellowston nation park, wolf reintroduction, histori wolv yellowstone, yellowston park bison herd, small mammal yellowston nation park, fish yellowston nation park amphibian reptil yellowston nation park yellowston wide consid finest megafauna wildlif habitat lower 48 states. almost 60 speci mammal park, includ gray wolf, threaten lynx, grizzli bears.[8] larg mammal includ bison (often refer buffalo), black bear, elk, moose, mule deer, white-tail deer, mountain goat, pronghorn, bighorn sheep, mountain lion. bison graze near hot spring yellowston park bison herd largest public herd american bison unit states. rel larg bison popul concern ranchers, fear speci transmit bovin diseas domest cousins. fact, half yellowstone' bison expos brucellosis, bacteri diseas came north america european cattl may caus cattl miscarry. diseas littl effect park bison, report case transmiss wild bison domest livestock filed. however, anim plant health inspect servic (aphis) state bison "like source" spread diseas cattl wyom north dakota. elk also carri diseas believ transmit infect hors cattle.[89] bison number 30 60 million individu throughout north america, yellowston remain one last strongholds. popul increas less 50 park 1902 4,000 2003. yellowston park bison herd reach peak 2005 4,900 animals. despit summer estim popul 4,700 2007, number drop 3,000 2008 harsh winter controversi brucellosi manag send hundr slaughter.[90] yellowston park bison herd believ one four free roam genet pure herd public land north america. three herd henri mountain bison herd utah, wind cave nation park south dakota elk island nation park alberta.[91] elk mother nurs calf combat perceiv threat brucellosi transmiss cattle, nation park personnel regularli harass bison herd back park ventur outsid area' borders. winter 1996–97, bison herd larg 1,079 bison exit park shot sent slaughter.[89] anim right activist argu cruel practic possibl diseas transmiss great rancher maintain. ecologist point bison mere travel season graze area lie within greater yellowston ecosystem convert cattl grazing, within nation forest leas privat ranchers. aphi state vaccin means, brucellosi elimin bison elk herd throughout yellowstone.[89] reintroduc northwestern wolf yellowston nation park start 1914, effort protect elk populations, u.s. congress appropri fund use purpos "destroy wolves, prairi dogs, anim injuri agricultur anim husbandry" public lands. park servic hunter carri orders, 1926 kill 136 wolves, wolv virtual elimin yellowstone.[92] extermin continu nation park servic end practic 1935. pass endang speci act 1973, wolf one first mammal speci listed.[92] wolv extirp yellowstone, coyot becam park' top canin predator. however, coyot abl bring larg animals, result lack top predat popul mark increas lame sick megafauna. bison yellowston nation park 1990s, feder govern revers view wolves. controversi decis u.s. fish wildlif servic (which overse threaten endang species), northwestern wolves, import canada, reintroduc park. reintroduct effort success popul remain rel stable. survey conduct 2005 report 13 wolf packs, total 118 individu yellowston 326 entir ecosystem. park figur lower report 2004 may attribut wolf migrat nearbi area suggest substanti increas montana popul interval.[93] almost wolv document descend 66 wolv reintroduc 1995–96.[93] recoveri popul throughout state wyoming, montana idaho success februari 27, 2008, u.s. fish wildlif servic remov northern rocki mountain wolf popul endang speci list.[94] black bear cub tower-roosevelt area estim 600 grizzli bear live greater yellowston ecosystem, half popul live within yellowstone. grizzli current list threaten species, howev u.s. fish wildlif servic announc intend take endang speci list yellowston region like keep list area yet recov fully. oppon delist grizzli concern state might allow hunt better conserv measur need implement ensur sustain population.[95] black bear common park park symbol due visitor interact bear start 1910. feed close contact bear permit sinc 1960 reduc desir human foods.[96] yellowston one place unit state black bear seen coexist grizzli bears.[96] black bear observ occur often park' northern rang bechler area park' southwestern corner.[97] elk earli morn fall 2010 popul figur elk excess 30,000—the largest popul larg mammal speci yellowstone. northern herd decreas enorm sinc mid‑1990s; attribut wolf predat causal effect elk use forest region evad predation, consequ make harder research accur count them.[98] northern herd migrat west southwestern montana winter. southern herd migrat southward, major elk winter nation elk refuge, immedi southeast grand teton nation park. southern herd migrat largest mammalian migrat remain u.s. outsid alaska. pronghorn commonli found grassland park. 2003 track one femal lynx cub spot follow 2 mile (3.2&#160;km). fecal materi evid obtain test confirm lynx. visual confirm made, however. lynx seen yellowston sinc 1998, though dna taken hair sampl obtain 2001 confirm lynx least transient park.[99] less commonli seen mammal includ mountain lion wolverine. mountain lion estim popul 25 individu parkwide.[100] wolverin anoth rare park mammal, accur popul figur speci known.[101] uncommon rare mammal provid insight health protect land yellowston help manag make determin best preserv habitats. eighteen speci fish live yellowstone, includ core rang yellowston cutthroat trout—a fish highli sought anglers.[8][102] yellowston cutthroat trout face sever threat sinc 1980s, includ suspect illeg introduct yellowston lake lake trout, invas speci consum smaller cutthroat trout.[103] although lake trout establish shoshon lewi lake snake river drainag u.s. govern stock oper 1890, never offici introduc yellowston river drainage.[104] cutthroat trout also face ongo drought, well accident introduct parasite—whirl disease—which caus termin nervou system diseas younger fish. sinc 2001, nativ sport fish speci caught yellowston waterway subject catch releas law.[102] yellowston also home six speci reptiles, paint turtl prairi rattlesnake, four speci amphibians, includ boreal choru frog.[105] 311 speci bird reported, almost half nest yellowstone.[8] 1999, twenty-six pair nest bald eagl documented. extrem rare sight whoop crane recorded, howev three exampl speci known live rocki mountains, 385 known worldwide.[106] birds, consid speci special concern rariti yellowstone, includ common loon, harlequin duck, osprey, peregrin falcon trumpet swan.[107] forest fires[edit] see also: yellowston fire 1988 1988 north american drought fire yellowston nation park wildfir natur part ecosystems, plant indigen yellowston adapt varieti ways. douglas-fir thick bark protect inner section tree fires. lodgepol pine —the common tree speci park— gener cone open heat fire. seed held place tough resin, fire assist melt resin, allow seed disperse. fire clear dead down wood, provid fewer obstacl lodgepol pine flourish. subalpin fir, engelmann spruce, whitebark pine, speci tend grow colder moister areas, fire less like occur. aspen tree sprout new growth roots, even sever fire kill tree ground, root often surviv unharm insul heat soil.[108] nation park servic estim natur conditions, grassland yellowston burn averag everi 20 25 years, forest park would experi fire everi 300 years.[108] thirty-f natur forest fire ignit year lightning, anoth six ten start people— case accident. yellowston nation park three fire lookout towers, staf train fire fighters. easiest one reach atop mount washburn, though close public. park also monitor fire air reli visitor report smoke and/or flames.[109] fire tower staf almost continu late june mid-september— primari fire season. fire burn greatest intens late afternoon evening. fire burn 100 acr (40&#160;ha), vast major fire reach littl acr (0.5&#160;ha) burn out.[110] fire manag focus monitor dead wood quantities, soil tree moisture, weather, determin area vulner fire one ignite. current polici suppress human caus fire evalu natur fires, examin benefit detriment may pose ecosystem. fire consid immedi threat peopl structures, burn control, fire suppress performed.[111] wildfir yellowston nation park produc pyrocumulu cloud effort minim chanc control fire threat peopl structures, park employe monitor potenti fire. control burn prescrib fire deliber start remov dead timber condit allow fire fighter opportun care control much wood consumed. natur fire sometim consid prescrib fire left burn. yellowstone, unlik parks, fire deliber start employe prescrib burns. however, last 30 years, 300 natur fire allow burn naturally. addition, fire fighter remov dead wood hazard area potenti fire threat live property, reduc chanc fire danger areas.[112] fire monitor also regul fire educ servic public known temporarili ban campfir campground period high fire danger. common notion earli unit state land manag polici forest fire bad. fire seen pure destruct forc littl understand integr part ecosystem. consequently, 1970s, better understand wildfir developed, fire suppressed. led increas dead die forests, would later provid fuel load fire would much harder, cases, imposs control. fire manag plan implemented, detail natur fire allow burn pose immedi threat live property. crown fire approach old faith complex septemb 7, 1988. 1988 start wet spring season although summer, drought began move throughout northern rockies, creat driest year record point. grass plant grew well earli summer abund spring moistur produc plenti grass, soon turn dri tinder. nation park servic began firefight effort keep fire control, extrem drought made suppress difficult. juli 15 21, 1988, fire quickli spread 8,500 acr (3,400&#160;ha; 13.3&#160;sq&#160;mi) throughout entir yellowston region, includ area outsid park, 99,000 acr (40,000&#160;ha; 155&#160;sq&#160;mi) park land alone. end month, fire control. larg fire burn together, august 20, 1988, singl worst day fires, 150,000 acr (61,000&#160;ha; 230&#160;sq&#160;mi) consumed. seven larg fire respons 95% 793,000 acr (321,000&#160;ha; 1,239&#160;sq&#160;mi) burn next coupl months. total 25,000 firefight u.s. militari forc particip suppress efforts, cost 120 million dollars. time winter brought snow help extinguish last flames, fire destroy 67 structur caus sever million dollar damage.[54] though civilian live lost, two personnel associ firefight effort killed. contrari media report specul time, fire kill park animals— survey indic 345 elk (of estim 40,000–50,000), 36 deer, 12 moose, 6 black bears, 9 bison perished. chang fire manag polici implement land manag agenc throughout unit states, base knowledg gain 1988 fire evalu scientist expert variou fields. 1992, yellowston adopt new fire manag plan observ stricter guidelin manag natur fires.[54] climate[edit] winter scene yellowston yellowston climat greatli influenc altitude, lower elev gener found warmer year round. record high temperatur 99&#160;°f (37&#160;°c) 2002, coldest temperatur record −66&#160;°f (−54&#160;°c) 1933.[8] summer month june earli september, daytim high normal 70 80&#160;°f (21 27&#160;°c) range, night time low go freez (0&#160;°c) especi higher altitudes. summer afternoon frequent accompani thunderstorms. spring fall temperatur rang 30 60&#160;°f (−1 16&#160;°c) night teen singl digit (−5 −20&#160;°c). winter yellowston accompani high temperatur usual zero 20&#160;°f (−20 −5&#160;°c) nighttim temperatur 0 &#160;°f (−18&#160;°c) winter.[113] precipit yellowston highli variabl rang 15 inch (380&#160;mm) annual near mammoth hot springs, 80 inch (2,000&#160;mm) southwestern section park. precipit yellowston greatli influenc moistur channel form snake river plain west was, turn, form yellowston itself. snow possibl month year, common novemb april, averag 150 inch (3,800&#160;mm) annual around yellowston lake, twice amount higher elevations.[113] tornado yellowston rare; however, juli 21, 1987, power tornado record wyom touch teton wilder bridger-teton nation forest hit yellowston nation park. call teton–yellowston tornado, classifi f4, wind speed estim 207 260 mile per hour (333 418&#160;km/h). tornado left path destruct 1 2 mile (1.6 3.2&#160;km) wide, 24 mile (39&#160;km) long, level 15,000 acr (6,100&#160;ha; 23&#160;sq&#160;mi) matur pine forest.[114] high elev area classifi humid continent (dfb), accord köppen-geig climat classification. (normals, 1981–2010)[117] sourc #2: western region climat center (extrem 1894–present)[118] recreation[edit] main articles: trail yellowston nation park angl yellowston nation park union pacif railway brochur promot travel park (1921) yellowston rank among popular nation park unit states. sinc mid-1960s, least 2 million tourist visit park almost everi year.[119] 2010, record number visitor came park july: 975,000. juli busiest month yellowston nation park.[120] peak summer levels, 3,700 employe work yellowston nation park concessionaires. concessionair manag nine hotel lodges, total 2,238 hotel room cabin available. also overse ga stations, store campgrounds. anoth 800 employe work either perman season nation park service.[8] park servic road lead major features; however, road reconstruct produc temporari road closures. yellowston midst long term road reconstruct effort, hamper short repair season. winter, road asid one enter gardiner, montana, extend cook city, montana, close wheel vehicles.[121] park road close wheel vehicl earli novemb mid april, park road remain close mid-may.[122] park 310 mile (500&#160;km) pave road access five differ entrances.[8] public transport avail insid park, sever tour compani contact guid motor transport. winter, concessionair oper guid snowmobil snow coach tours, though number access base quota establish nation park service.[123] facil old faithful, canyon mammoth hot spring area park busi summer months. traffic jam creat road construct peopl observ wildlif result long delays. old faith inn nation park servic maintain 9 visitor center museum respons mainten histor structur mani 2,000 buildings. structur includ nation histor landmark old faith inn built 1903 1904 entir fort yellowston – mammoth hot spring histor district. histor educ tour avail fort yellowston detail histori nation park servic develop park. campfir programs, guid walk interpret present avail numer locat summer, limit basi seasons. camp avail dozen campground 2,000 campsites.[8] camp also avail surround nation forests, well grand teton nation park south. backcountri campsit access foot horseback requir permit. 1,100 mile (1,800&#160;km) hike trail available.[124] park consid good destin mountain instabl volcan rock predominates. visitor pet requir keep leash time limit area near roadway "frontcountry" zone drive campgrounds.[125] around thermal features, wooden pave trail construct ensur visitor safety, area handicap accessible. nation park servic maintain year-round clinic mammoth hot spring provid emerg servic throughout year.[126] hunt permitted, though allow surround nation forest open season. fish popular activity, yellowston park fish licens requir fish park waters.[127] mani park water fli fish nativ fish speci catch releas only.[128] boat prohibit river creek except 5 mile (8.0&#160;km) stretch lewi river lewi shoshon lake, open non-motor use only. yellowston lake marina, lake popular boat destination.[129] vintag photo human-habitu bear seek food visitors. earli histori park, visitor allowed, sometim even encouraged, feed bears. visitor welcom chanc get pictur taken bears, learn beg food. led numer injuri human year. 1970, park offici chang polici start vigor program educ public danger close contact bears, tri elimin opportun bear find food campground trash collect areas. although becom difficult observ bear recent years, number human injuri death taken signific drop visitor less danger.[130] eighth record bear-rel death park' histori occur august 2015.[131] protect land region includ caribou-targhee, gallatin, custer, shoshon bridger-teton nation forests. nation park service' john d. rockefeller,&#160;jr. memori parkway south lead grand teton nation park. fame beartooth highway provid access northeast spectacular high altitud scenery. nearbi commun includ west yellowstone, montana; cody, wyoming; red lodge, montana; ashton, idaho; gardiner, montana. closest air transport avail way bozeman, montana; billings, montana; jackson; cody, wyoming, idaho falls, idaho.[132] salt lake city, 320 mile (510&#160;km) south, closest larg metropolitan area. legal jurisdiction[edit] entir park within jurisdict unit state district court district wyoming, make feder court district includ portion one state (idaho, montana, wyoming). law professor brian c. kalt argu may imposs impanel juri complianc vicinag claus sixth amend crime commit sole unpopul idaho portion park (and would difficult crime commit sole lightli popul montana portion).[133] one defendant, accus wildlife-rel crime montana portion park, attempt rais argument eventu plead guilty.[134][135] see also[edit] north america portal list nation park unit state list yellowston nation park relat
